com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.util

Class Dates

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.util.Dates

  • public final class Dates
extends Object
    Implementation of various date and time related runtime functions.

    • Method Detail

      • DateAdd

        public static void DateAdd(Calendar date,
           int intervalKind,
           int interval)
        Adds a time interval to the given date.
        Parameters:
        date - date to add to
        intervalKind - kind of interval
        interval - units to add

      • DateValue

        public static Calendar DateValue(String value)
        Creates a date from the given string.

        Dates must be formatted as follows:
        MM/DD/YYYY hh:mm:ss
        or
        MM/DD/YYYY
        or
        hh:mm
        where MM is the month (01-12), DD the day (01-31), YYYY the year (0000-9999), hh the hours (00-23), mm the minutes (00-59) and ss the seconds (00-59).

        Parameters:
        value - string to convert
        Returns:
        date

      • Day

        public static int Day(Calendar date)
        Returns the day of the month for the given date.
        Parameters:
        date - date to get day of
        Returns:
        day (range 1 - 31)
